entities.name: NVIDIA
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is a technology company involved in the design and manufacturing of graphics processing units (GPUs) and related technologies. They have a comprehensive Code of Conduct and report on executive compensation, security ownership, and equity compensation plans.

entities.name: BOARD OF DIRECTORS
entities.description: The Board of Directors at NVIDIA Corporation oversees corporate governance, director independence, and related transactions. They are also responsible for recommending directors and reviewing transactions with related persons.

entities.name: DIRECTORS
entities.description: Directors at NVIDIA Corporation are involved in overseeing corporate governance and are recommended through specific procedures. They are also evaluated for their independence as part of corporate governance practices.

entities.name: SHAREHOLDERS
entities.description: Shareholders of NVIDIA Corporation are the owners of the company's stock and are involved in decision-making processes through voting and other activities.

entities.name: FINANCIAL TEAM
entities.description: The Financial Team at NVIDIA Corporation is responsible for financial reporting, including the publication of the Code of Conduct and Financial Team Code of Conduct on the company's website.

relationships.relationship_description: The Board of Directors oversees corporate governance and other key aspects of NVIDIA Corporation.
Directors are members of the Board of Directors at NVIDIA Corporation.
Shareholders are the owners of NVIDIA Corporation's stock and have voting rights.
The Financial Team is responsible for financial reporting and compliance at NVIDIA Corporation.
